name: drainage area
description: An area (also known as 'catchment') having a common outlet for its surface runoff, in km2.

name: large scale (100 km .. < 3000 km)
description: An area or volume of 100 km to 3000 km horizontal extent (e.g., fronts, various cyclones, cloud clusters).

name: mesoscale (3 km .. < 100 km)
description: An area or volume of 3 km to 100 km horizontal extent (e.g., thunderstorms, sea and mountain breezes).

name: microscale (< 100 m)
description: An area or volume less than 100 m horizontal extent (e.g., evaporation).

name: planetary scale (> 3000 km)
description: An area or volume of more than 3000 km horizontal extent (e.g., long upper tropospheric waves).

name: toposcale, local scale (100 m .. < 3 km)
description: An area or volume of 100 m to 3 km horizontal extent (e.g., air pollution, tornadoes).

name: inapplicable
description: Not applicable in the context of the observed quantity.

name: unknown
description: The representativeness is unknown in the context of the observed quantity.
